column1: Traffic reports will resume Wednesday May 22 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Signals Dark Due to Power Outage:
column4: Leestown Rd at Boiling Springs Dr
Old Vine St will NOT be closed on May 28 as stated on a message board.  The message board was incorrectly placed.
The actual closure will occur on S Mill St between W Maxwell St and W High St due to major sewer line work.
This section of Mill St is expected to be closed for approximately two months.
